cheatsheet.title: Create a new Business Rule Analysis

intro.description:
This kind of analysis enables you to apply your Data Quality rules (DQ Rules) on a selected table.
Note that you can create DQ rules and assign them to the created analysis at a later stage of the analysis preparation.

item.title: Set the analysis metadata.
item.description: This step opens the analysis creation wizard. You can right click on the "Analysis" folder or on a column (or click the link below). This wizard helps you to fill the analysis metadata (name, purpose, description....). At the end it opens an editor in which you can define the settings of the analysis.

item.title: Select tables/views to analyze.
item.description: Click on the "Select tables/views to analyze." hyperlink (or click the link below).

item.title: Add some rule to the column
item.description: you can click "add dq rule" button after column or Drag from the tree at left to add new rule.

item.title: Analyze.
item.description: To execute the analysis, click on the "Run" button at the bottom of the editor (or click the link below). You can run the analysis with a context menu on the "Analysis" object in the "DQ Repository" view.
